item.description: â€‹ Camping in snow capped Himalayas in Uttarakhand All links are arranged by their chronologically descending order: 30/12/2024 Continue.dev Open source AI code assistant https://github.com/continuedev/continue Ollama Run LLM models locally (or on docker) https://ollama.com/blog/continue-code-assistant https://github.com/ollama/ollama 27/12/2024 Science of High-Performing Teams Talent Team building Series of habits, not a one-day exercise Requires sense of 3 elements: Common understanding (shared understanding) Understand what you want to do - Clarity on each other goals, deliverables, how it fits into the bigger picture, etc.
